source.author: Duretto, M.F.
source.title: Rutaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Duretto, M.F. (1999). Rutaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Leaves narrow-spathulate or narrow-elliptic, 5–32 mm long, 2–4 mm wide, plane or margin recurved slightly; petals 6–12 mm long; anther appendage densely bearded
Leaves linear-spathulate, 10–15 mm long, 1–1.5 mm wide, margin revolute or recurved; petals 6–9 mm long; anther appendage moderately bearded
